title: Sexy Party / Death on the Fourposter (Thriller, 1964) by Josipovici & Molteni | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Sexy Party / Death on the Fourposter (Thriller, 1964) by Josipovici & Molteni | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
Secrets, seances, and strangulation!
A group of 60's hipsters set out for a party at a creepy castle, where they become embroiled in love triangles and bizarre mind games. As strange prophecies start coming true, the evening takes a deadly turn, revealing unexpected twists and a campy, unpredictable plot with a low body count.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/KrOGyWQI0XM


Original title: Delitto allo specchio (1964) AKA: Death on the Fourposter / Sexy Party

Directors: Jean Josipovici, Ambrogio Molteni
Writers: Jean Josipovici, Giorgio Stegani
Stars: John Drew Barrymore, Gloria Milland, Luisa Rivelli
Genre: Colorized classics, Italian giallo film, Horror, Thriller

This film has English audio, and subtitled in many languages
